verbs.description: perfectionize (third-person singular simple present perfectionizes, present participle perfectionizing, simple past and past participle perfectionized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, chiefly archaic) To bring to perfection; to perfect.
examples: A solitary life is not the atmosphere to perfectionize any virtue.
Don't obsess or perfectionize! The reality check is just that, and you have to get out there and get started.
